Message:
Stepping outside,
at least a dozen
villagers and humans alike
were sprawled across
the ground, unmoving.
A-At this rate, we’ll all be...

I-I have to act now...!
But, can I actually
do anything?

All of my previous attempts
to use my power have failed.
What if I end up
hurting everyone...?

I felt her warm embrace
and my worries
began to fade away.

“You don’t have to fight.
You’re fine the way you are.
Stay kind...”

But then,
there was a sudden
flash of light from afar...

She pushed me away,
and a gunshot
rang out behind me...

I slowly forced myself
to turn and look,
only to see her
slumped on the floor.

All because
I didn’t use my power...!
